document.full_text: tribune co noteholders and retirees sued the company's former shareholders for billions of dollars, alleging the 2007 buyout of the owner of the chicago tribune and los angeles times forced it to file for bankruptcy.
document.title: tribune creditors sue ex-shareholders for billions
lines_and_colors: tribune co noteholders and retirees sued the company's former shareholders for billions of dollars, alleging the 2007 buyout of the owner of the chicago tribune and los angeles times forced it to file for bankruptcy.
